file_bin_read_byte: This function will return a byte of data from current position within the file with the given file ID. You supply the file ID value, as returned by the function file_bin_open().
NOTE: These functions do not work when the target module is HTML5.
The ID of the file to get the data from.
This would open a file from the same directory as the game, and get a byte of data from it before closing it again.
